translations: n.（尤指《圣经》中耶稣所讲的的）（道德或宗教）寓言

phrs.translation: 寓言, 寓言故事, 譬喻
十个童女的比喻, 十童女的比喻
史丹利的寓言, 斯坦利的寓言, 史丹利的预言, 史丹利寓言
浪子回头, 浪子回的比喻, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: The minister preached a sermon on the parable of the lost sheep.
sentences.translation: 牧师讲道时用了亡羊的比喻。

sentences.sentence: I launched into the parable, embellishing the story with invented dialogue and extra details.
sentences.translation: 我开始投入地讲这个寓言，编了些对话和额外细节为故事添油加醋。

sentences.sentence: I think the genius of this parable hinges on the fact that the servant who was only given one gold coin seems to be acting so perfectly reasonably.
sentences.translation: 我认为这则寓言的特别之处在于，那个只拿到一个金币的仆人的行为是很合理的。
